column1: It finishes goalless between Morocco and Croatia. There wasn't much to split the sides
column2: with both of them having just two shots on target each in the game. Croatia had the better of the first-half chances
column3: with Perisic and Modric firing over and Vlasic forcing a good save out of Bounou. After the break
column4: Mazraoui saw a diving header pushed away before Livakovic denied Hakimi's powerful long-range strike.
